summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of the airbrake control context, covering initialization, state updates, data packet generation, interaction with the apogee predictor, logging, start/stop sequences, exception handling, and performance benchmarking.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the airbrake management component in aerospace systems by ensuring it processes sensor data, updates its internal state, communicates correctly with prediction modules, handles shutdown gracefully, and meets required performance standards.
